title: Peter Reed
body:
The Task

We were asked to raise awareness of Peter Reed and their reputation as makers of high quality linen products.

The Solution

We used photography of upmarket images combined with provocative headlines to deliver a stylish 'smile' and grab attention.

The Results

The campaign was well received both internally and externally but unfortunately no concrete sales figures were available.
